full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 210 of 228 886 LC2VMAX6 Alessi - Direct situated at the kitchen -- kitchen desk. Q. And that would have been your desk; is that correct? A. No, that was the kitchen -- the desk -- that was the desk for anybody to use. Q. I see. So one message pad at the kitchen desk, and anybody could answer the phone and write down a message; is that correct? A. Yes. Q. Okay. And then at some point, this message book was put into a closet, would that have been the practice? A. Yes. Q. And then you don't know what happened to it after that? A. No. MR. PAGLIUCA: Your Honor, I have no objection to the messages that were identified by Mr. Alessi as to his handwriting or his wife's handwriting. I think those have been authenticated. I object to the remainder as being hearsay. THE COURT: Can you specify as to 2A through 2W? MR. PAGLIUCA: Yes. I'll have to go back to that exhibit, your Honor. THE COURT: Okay. Maybe Ms. Comey can -- MR. PAGLIUCA: Sure. So 2A, your Honor, I don't object to. That's a cover page. THE COURT: Okay. MR. PAGLIUCA: I think 2 -- I don't have a 2B in my SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012495
